courseDescription: Learn to perform the tasks of an Author in Adobe Captivate Prime
courseOverview: Learn all about the Author's role in Adobe Captivate Prime. This course provides a detailed introduction to all of the major concepts involved in acting as an author in Prime. Learn to create course modules, build courses, integrate live face to face and virtual classrooms and more. Learn to align your courses with skills and how to publish and retire courses. Virtually all aspects of Prime authoring are covered.

module.description: Learn all about the Author's role in Adobe Captivate Prime. This video provides a detailed introduction to all of the major concepts involved in acting as an author in Prime. Learn to create course modules, build courses, integrate live face to face and virtual classrooms and more.  Learn to align your courses with skills and how to publish and retire courses. Virtually all aspects of Prime authoring are covered.
module.title: Prime Author Overview

module.description: A short quiz designed to evaluate your comprehension of the basic concepts in Adobe Captivate Prime for Authors. Don't worry if you're not a pro yet, you can explore / retry questions as often as you like.
module.title: Prime Authoring Assessment

courseDescription: Learn about the experience and opportunities of learning in Adobe Captivate Prime
courseOverview: Learn all about the Learner's role in Adobe Captivate Prime. This course provides a detailed introduction to all of the major concepts involved in acting as an learner in Prime. Learn to use the single universal Fluidic player to access all of your course materials in one place. Discover how to browse the catalog for courses that interest you or provide you opportunities to upskill. Learn to master every aspect of badges and gamification to take your rightful place on the leaderboard.

module.description: A short quiz designed to evaluate your comprehension of the basic concepts in Adobe Captivate Prime for Learners. Don't worry if you're not a pro yet, you can explore / retry questions as often as you like.
module.title: Prime Learner Assessment

courseDescription: Learn to perform the tasks of a Manager in Adobe Captivate Prime
courseOverview: Learn all about the Manager's role in Adobe Captivate Prime. This course provides a detailed introduction to all of the major concepts involved in acting as a manager in Prime. Learn to read reports and approve requests from your direct reports.

module.description: Learn all about the Manager's role in Adobe Captivate Prime. This video provides a detailed introduction to all of the major concepts involved in acting as a manager in Prime. Learn to read reports and approve requests from your direct reports.

courseDescription: Learn to perform the tasks of an Administrator in Adobe Captivate Prime
courseOverview: Learn all about the Administrator's role in Adobe Captivate Prime. This course provides a detailed introduction to all of the major concepts involved in acting as an administrator in Prime. Learn to import users, set up your account, work with badges and gamification. Virtually all aspects of Prime administration are covered.

courseOverview: Make learning enjoyable with gamification, unified content playback and high-quality video stream. Enable always-on learning with a mobile app that serves up learning content and notifications. Provide just-for-me experiences with personalized dashboards and course recommendations.
